receive_cargo_site_id = #{receiveCargoSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_cargo_site = #{receiveCargoSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_center_cargo_site_id = #{receiveCenterCargoSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id = #{receiveCargoSiteFreightYardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, short_barge_carrier_mode = #{shortBargeCarrierMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, short_barge_carrier_id = begin_center_site_id = #{beginCenterSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_center_site_name = #{beginCenterSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_site_id = #{beginSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_site_name = #{beginSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_site_freight_yard = #{beginSiteFreightYard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_address = #{beginAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_center_site_id = #{endCenterSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_center_site_name = #{endCenterSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_site_id = #{endSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_site_name = #{endSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_site_freight_yard = #{endSiteFreightYard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_address = #{endAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, material_cost = #{materialCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tarpaulin_cost = #{tarpaulinCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, begin_stevedoring_cost = #{beginStevedoringCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, end_stevedoring_cost = #{endStevedoringCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freight_sum = #{freightSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, forwarding_site_id = #{forwardingSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, forwarding_site_name = #{forwardingSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forwarding_center_site_id = forwarding_unit_name = #{forwardingUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_place = #{takePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_place_detail = #{takePlaceDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiving_department_id = #{receivingDepartmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiving_department_name = #{receivingDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_place = #{arrivePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_place_address = #{arrivePlaceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pick_up_price = #{pickUpPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, train_price = #{trainPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, arrive_price = #{arrivePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transport_price = #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_distribution_id = #{projectDistributionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, edit_date = #{editDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is__distribution = #{isDistribution,jdbcType=TINYINT}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, finish_date = #{finishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select p.id,p.project_code projectCode,p.branch_group_id,p.branch_group_name,p.project_type,p.transport_type,p. cargo_id,p.cargo_name,p.cargo_specifications,p.cargo_price,p.valuation_unit_name,p.send_cargo_company_id,p. send_cargo_company_name,p.receive_cargo_company_id,p.receive_cargo_company_name,p.send_cargo_unit_id,p. send_cargo_unit_name,p.receive_cargo_site_id,p.receive_cargo_site,p.receive_center_cargo_site_id,p. receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id,p.short_barge_carrier_mode,p.short_barge_carrier_id,p. short_barge_carrier_name,p.send_short_barge_carrier_mode,p.begin_center_site_id,p.begin_center_site_name,p. begin_site_id,p.begin_site_name,p.begin_site_freight_yard,p.begin_address,p.end_center_site_id,p. end_center_site_name,p.end_site_id,p.end_site_name,p.end_site_freight_yard,p.end_address,p. freight,p.material_cost,p.tarpaulin_cost,p.begin_stevedoring_cost,p.end_stevedoring_cost,p. freight_sum,p.forwarding_site_id,p.forwarding_site_name,p.forwarding_center_site_id,p. forwarding_site_freight_yard_id,p.forwarding_unit_id,p.forwarding_unit_name,p.take_place,p. take_place_detail,p.receiving_department_id,p.receiving_department_name,p.arrive_place,p. arrive_place_address,p.pick_up_price,p.train_price,p.arrive_price,p.transport_price,p. remark,p.create_date,p.project_distribution_id,p.edit_date,p.status,p.creator_id,p.principal,p. is__distribution,p.delete_flag,p.finish_date from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id
order by ${orderByClause}
select is__distribution from tb_project where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id ,project_code projectCode,cargo_name cargoName, cargo_specifications cargoSpecifications,cargo_price cargoPrice,valuation_unit_name valuationUnitName from tb_project where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update tb_project set is__distribution = #{distribution,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from tb_project where delete_flag = 0
select from tb_project where id = #{id,jdbcType = INTEGER}

select
distinct
p.id,p.project_code projectCode,p.branch_group_id,p.branch_group_name,p.project_type,p.transport_type,p. cargo_id,p.cargo_name,p.cargo_specifications,p.cargo_price,p.valuation_unit_name,p.send_cargo_company_id,p. send_cargo_company_name,p.receive_cargo_company_id,p.receive_cargo_company_name,p.send_cargo_unit_id,p. send_cargo_unit_name,p.receive_cargo_site_id,p.receive_cargo_site,p.receive_center_cargo_site_id,p. receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id,p.short_barge_carrier_mode,p.short_barge_carrier_id,p. short_barge_carrier_name,p.send_short_barge_carrier_mode,p.begin_center_site_id,p.begin_center_site_name,p. begin_site_id,p.begin_site_name,p.begin_site_freight_yard,p.begin_address,p.end_center_site_id,p. end_center_site_name,p.end_site_id,p.end_site_name,p.end_site_freight_yard,p.end_address,p. freight,p.material_cost,p.tarpaulin_cost,p.begin_stevedoring_cost,p.end_stevedoring_cost,p. freight_sum,p.forwarding_site_id,p.forwarding_site_name,p.forwarding_center_site_id,p. forwarding_site_freight_yard_id,p.forwarding_unit_id,p.forwarding_unit_name,p.take_place,p. take_place_detail,p.receiving_department_id,p.receiving_department_name,p.arrive_place,p. arrive_place_address,p.pick_up_price,p.train_price,p.arrive_price,p.transport_price,p. remark,p.create_date,p.project_distribution_id,p.edit_date,p.status,p.creator_id,p.principal,p. is__distribution,p.delete_flag,p.finish_date from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select p.id,p.project_code projectCode,p.branch_group_id,p.branch_group_name,p.project_type,p.transport_type,p. cargo_id,p.cargo_name,p.cargo_specifications,p.cargo_price,p.valuation_unit_name,p.send_cargo_company_id,p. send_cargo_company_name,p.receive_cargo_company_id,p.receive_cargo_company_name,p.send_cargo_unit_id,p. send_cargo_unit_name,p.receive_cargo_site_id,p.receive_cargo_site,p.receive_center_cargo_site_id,p. receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id,p.short_barge_carrier_mode,p.short_barge_carrier_id,p. short_barge_carrier_name,p.send_short_barge_carrier_mode,p.begin_center_site_id,p.begin_center_site_name,p. begin_site_id,p.begin_site_name,p.begin_site_freight_yard,p.begin_address,p.end_center_site_id,p. end_center_site_name,p.end_site_id,p.end_site_name,p.end_site_freight_yard,p.end_address,p. freight,p.material_cost,p.tarpaulin_cost,p.begin_stevedoring_cost,p.end_stevedoring_cost,p. freight_sum,p.forwarding_site_id,p.forwarding_site_name,p.forwarding_center_site_id,p. forwarding_site_freight_yard_id,p.forwarding_unit_id,p.forwarding_unit_name,p.take_place,p. take_place_detail,p.receiving_department_id,p.receiving_department_name,p.arrive_place,p. arrive_place_address,p.pick_up_price,p.train_price,p.arrive_price,p.transport_price,p. remark,p.create_date,p.project_distribution_id,p.edit_date,p.status,p.creator_id,p.principal,p. is__distribution,p.delete_flag,p.finish_date
from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id where branch_group_id in
#{item}
and y.tab_name='tb_project' and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{sysOrgCode},'%') and transport_type in (3,4,5,6) and project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and delete_flag = 0 and status in (1,3)

select p.id,p.project_code projectCode,p.branch_group_id,p.branch_group_name,p.project_type,p.transport_type,p. cargo_id,p.cargo_name,p.cargo_specifications,p.cargo_price,p.valuation_unit_name,p.send_cargo_company_id,p. send_cargo_company_name,p.receive_cargo_company_id,p.receive_cargo_company_name,p.send_cargo_unit_id,p. send_cargo_unit_name,p.receive_cargo_site_id,p.receive_cargo_site,p.receive_center_cargo_site_id,p. receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id,p.short_barge_carrier_mode,p.short_barge_carrier_id,p. short_barge_carrier_name,p.send_short_barge_carrier_mode,p.begin_center_site_id,p.begin_center_site_name,p. begin_site_id,p.begin_site_name,p.begin_site_freight_yard,p.begin_address,p.end_center_site_id,p. end_center_site_name,p.end_site_id,p.end_site_name,p.end_site_freight_yard,p.end_address,p. freight,p.material_cost,p.tarpaulin_cost,p.begin_stevedoring_cost,p.end_stevedoring_cost,p. freight_sum,p.forwarding_site_id,p.forwarding_site_name,p.forwarding_center_site_id,p. forwarding_site_freight_yard_id,p.forwarding_unit_id,p.forwarding_unit_name,p.take_place,p. take_place_detail,p.receiving_department_id,p.receiving_department_name,p.arrive_place,p. arrive_place_address,p.pick_up_price,p.train_price,p.arrive_price,p.transport_price,p. remark,p.create_date,p.project_distribution_id,p.edit_date,p.status,p.creator_id,p.principal,p. is__distribution,p.delete_flag,p.finish_date
from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id where branch_group_id in
#{item}
and y.tab_name='tb_project' and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{sysOrgCode},'%') and transport_type in (3,4,5,6) and delete_flag = 0 and status in (1,3) order by create_date desc

select p.id,p.project_code projectCode,p.branch_group_id,p.branch_group_name,p.project_type,p.transport_type,p. cargo_id,p.cargo_name,p.cargo_specifications,p.cargo_price,p.valuation_unit_name,p.send_cargo_company_id,p. send_cargo_company_name,p.receive_cargo_company_id,p.receive_cargo_company_name,p.send_cargo_unit_id,p. send_cargo_unit_name,p.receive_cargo_site_id,p.receive_cargo_site,p.receive_center_cargo_site_id,p. receive_cargo_site_freight_yard_id,p.short_barge_carrier_mode,p.short_barge_carrier_id,p. short_barge_carrier_name,p.send_short_barge_carrier_mode,p.begin_center_site_id,p.begin_center_site_name,p. begin_site_id,p.begin_site_name,p.begin_site_freight_yard,p.begin_address,p.end_center_site_id,p. end_center_site_name,p.end_site_id,p.end_site_name,p.end_site_freight_yard,p.end_address,p. freight,p.material_cost,p.tarpaulin_cost,p.begin_stevedoring_cost,p.end_stevedoring_cost,p. freight_sum,p.forwarding_site_id,p.forwarding_site_name,p.forwarding_center_site_id,p. forwarding_site_freight_yard_id,p.forwarding_unit_id,p.forwarding_unit_name,p.take_place,p. take_place_detail,p.receiving_department_id,p.receiving_department_name,p.arrive_place,p. arrive_place_address,p.pick_up_price,p.train_price,p.arrive_price,p.transport_price,p. remark,p.create_date,p.project_distribution_id,p.edit_date,p.status,p.creator_id,p.principal,p. is__distribution,p.delete_flag,p.finish_date
from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id where branch_group_id in
#{item}
and y.tab_name='tb_project' and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{sysOrgCode},'%') and transport_type in (0,1,2,4,5,6,7) and delete_flag = 0 and status in (1,3) order by create_date desc

select p.id,p.project_code from tb_project p left join tb_branch_group_link y on p.id=y.row_id and y.tab_name='tb_project' where p.delete_flag = 0 and p.status in (1,2) and y.sys_org_code like CONCAT(#{sysOrgCode},'%')
and p.transport_type in(0)
and p.transport_type in(1,4,6,7)
and p.transport_type is not null
mapper.update: update tb_project set status = 1 where id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select A.id as driverId,C.id informationId,C.driver_name driverName,C.motorcycle_type motorcycleType, C.driver_phone driverPhone,C.model model,C.plate_number plateNumber,A.car_team_id teamId from tb_login_user as A, tb_user_information as C where C.id = A.information_id and C.plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType = VARCHAR} limit 1

select lu.id driverId,info.id informationId,lu.car_team_id teamId,info. NAME ownerCarName,info.model model,info.driver_name driverName, info.brand brand,info.motorcycle_type motorcycleType,info.driver_phone driverPhone,info.plate_number plateNumber from tb_project AS pro ,tb_order tor,tb_login_user lu ,tb_user_information info where pro.id=tor.project_id AND tor.driver_id = lu.id AND lu.information_id = info.id AND tor.is_cancel =0 AND tor.delete_flag=0 AND tor.status IN (2,3,4,5) AND tor.receipter_date is NULL AND lu.type = 0 AND lu.state = 1 and pro.id = #{projectId,jdbcType = INTEGER}

SELECT lu.id driverId, info.id informationId, lu.car_team_id teamId, team.car_item_name teamName, info. NAME ownerCarName, info.model model, info.driver_name driverName, info.brand brand, info.motorcycle_type motorcycleType, info.driver_phone driverPhone, info.plate_number plateNumber FROM tb_login_user lu LEFT JOIN tb_user_information info ON lu.information_id = info.id LEFT JOIN tb_car_team team ON lu.car_team_id = team.id where lu.id = #{driverId,jdbcType = INTEGER}
